5.3 DUIM-Sheets Module

medium-transform

Generic function

Summary

Returns the transform for the specified medium.

Signature

medium-transform medium => transform

Arguments

medium
An instance of type <medium>.

Values

transform
An instance of type <transform>.

Library

duim-sheets

Module

duim-sheets

Description

Returns the transform for medium.

See also

medium-transform-setter, page 310

sheet-transform, page 363

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
